front.title: LDAPv3bis Suggestions: The String Representation of LDAP Search Filters

abstract.t: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) [1] defines a networkrepresentation of a search filter transmitted to an LDAP server. Someapplications may find it useful to have a common way of representingthese search filters in a human-readable form. This document definesa human-readable string format for representing LDAP search filters.This document replaces RFC 1960, extending the string LDAP filterdefinition to include support for LDAP version 3 extended matchfilters, and including support for representing the full range ofpossible LDAP search filters.
